de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes

Class TimerEventInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes.AbstractControlNodeInstance
      • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes.AbstractEvent
        • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes.TimerEventInstance

  • public class TimerEventInstance
extends AbstractEvent
    Represent timer events. Currently only time spans are supported (e.g. one day).

    • Field Summary

      java.util.Date getTerminationDate()
      Calculate the termination of the timer from the current time and the specified time span.
      java.lang.String getType() 
      void registerEvent()
      Since timer events are not registered at a Event platform, but are handled internally, calls specific method for timer events.
